professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in data migration, SQL Server administration, and Linux operations. Skilled in using tools like BCP for data migration and AWS cloud platforms. Career goal is to leverage these skills in a cloud-based environment.

key_responsibilities: Conducted gap analysis to identify gaps and defined business processes.
Created functional and non-functional requirement documents using UML diagrams.
Facilitated UAT for internal systems with business users.
Administered live SQL servers focusing on high availability.
Managed SQL Server logins and users
Performed routine maintenance activities such as backup recovery and replication.
Migrated large volumes of data using BCP and SQL Loader.
Validated data accuracy post-migration using custom scripts.
Documented migration processes for future reference.

tools_and_software:
SQL Server Agent",
            "BCP",
            "SQL Loader",
            "Import/Export Wizard",
            "Amazon Web Services (AWS)
